Summary: Appeared out of nowhere, random blinking red/green lights with an irregular path of flight.
divs: sighting detailsi was at home oddly enough watching the season premiere of "chasing ufos" on natgeo. i happened to be looking outside to my backyard, through the glass doors, and saw what looked like a star, but however it appeared out of nowhere. it just appeared, it hovered for a bit and then just gradually moved around in a very irregular flight path before slowly fading out. strangely enough during the sighting of this star like ufo, a bright flash like a camera flash happened and no less that 1 or 2 seconds later what looked like a shooting star dashed across the sky. it was too low to be a shooting star. at that time of night, it was unusually bright out from a bright moon. it must have been going thousands of miles per hour, it just darted across the sky. what i did see though, was that whatever craft if was had a very odd glow to it. almost like a glow in the dark dull yellow green. like bioluminesence. it was very odd. however the first star like ufo i saw was very high in the air, maybe 70,000 feet, in my best guess. from where i was standing it was at a 45 degree angle in a slight ese direction. i guess it would then be hovering over the vista\san marcos area which is about 10 miles or so east from carlsbad. the flash for the second ufo came from across the hill, over el camino real, near some houses and a power line, maybe it's a telephone line, i don't know. it looked like it came from a house. it was like a camera flash, but it was huge, so it couldn't have been a camera. who would be out at that hour taking photos anyway? afterwards my dog started to act a bit frightened, it might have been from the flash. she's easily scared by lightning, but there was no weather of that sort in our area. very strange.
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Carlsbad
There were no other sightings in Carlsbad on or around June 29th 2012
